General.Name: CviLux Corp
General.Description: CviLux Corporation manufactures and sells connectors, FFC, and wire harnesses in Taiwan. Its connectors include board to board, CCFL, coaxial, combo D-sub, DVI, FFC/FPC, IEEE, HDMI, LVDS, memory and sim card, mini-DIN, power, serial ATA, telephone/modular jack, USB, wire to board crimp style, wire to board insulation displacement, waterproof, and ribbon cable connectors, as well as application tooling and IC sockets. The company also offers cable assemblies; PCBA turnkey solutions; LVDS cables; USB type-c hubs; and fiber optics connectors and cables. It serves consumer electronics, computers, communication, and electro-optical industries. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 9, Chung-Cheng East Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 25147
